She killed my hamster.
She cooked it and fed it to me.
Jesus!
Well, boo- fucking- hoo!
What kind of a comedy doesn't have a happy ending?

translation.en: Anemona? Is that you?
No, it's not Anemona, you dumb- ass!
translation.fr: Non. Ce n'est pas Anemona, abruti.

translation.en: Look at you, crying like a little girl.

translation.en: Oh, Anemona, where are you? Please don't leave me!
translation.fr: Anemona, où es-tu ? Ne me quitte pas.

translation.en: I don't know who you are, I don't know what you want...
translation.fr: Qui c'est ? J'ignore ce que tu me veux

translation.en: But if you don't tell me, I will look for you,
translation.fr: mais si tu ne me le dis pas, je te chercherai,

translation.en: I will find you and I will kill you!
translation.fr: je te trouverai et je te tuerai.

translation.en: The speech from Taken? Seriously?
How ridiculously stupid!
Holy shit!
Hey, watch your mouth in the presence of... the Almighty!
translation.fr: - Putain. - Modère tes propos en présence du Tout-Puissant.

translation.en: You disgusting sinner!
Let's try this!
How did you do that?
If I'm God, I guess you must be Jesus.

translation.en: You know, you can walk on water. Come on, try it!

translation.en: - What a dumb motherfucker! - Who the hell are you?
You haven't figured it out by now? I'm future you, buddy.

translation.en: I mean... fuck me! Whatever!
Wait!
- You can take me wherever I want? - Where do you wanna go?

translation.en: So... You gonna hook up with her?
You know what?
Fuck you, dude!
You do know you could've just gone back to last night
translation.fr: Tu aurais pu revivre la nuit dernière et ne pas te faire sucer par Ramona.
